None.Name: Explosion Blast
None.Description: Activate to emit a cone-shaped blast wave that deals 690 damage to enemies in an arc of 45m, up to 2100 in total. Knocks back small and medium units. Also triggers Detonation.

None.Name: Detonation
None.Description: Explodes when being destroyed charge deals 800 damage to enemies in a 20m radius around its target, up to 2000 in total. Knocks back small and medium units.

None.Name: Self-Destruct
None.Description: Activate to trigger Detonation by destroying the bomb
